kpi.name: sgsn_970b

kpi_info.title: Rejected Gb attach attempts due to overload noticed by the PAPU in 2nd OL control point
kpi_info.use: This KPI shows the number of rejected attach attempts from Gb interface due to overload noticed by the PAPU in the second overload control point.

kpi.kpi_alias: Rejected Gb attach attempts due to overload noticed by the PAPU in 2nd OL control point
